about_the_game:
Unveiling the epitome of elegance and allure with our latest Steam DLC.Immerse yourself in a world where beauty meets tranquility as you adorn your in-game character with a stunning collection of yoga apparel that seamlessly blends grace and sensuality.

Indulge in the artistry of design as each garment captivates with intricate details and vibrant colors, reflecting the harmonious spirit of yoga. From gracefully crafted leggings to intricately designed sports bras, every piece in this DLC is a testament to the fusion of fashion and functionality.

Elevate your virtual presence with the allure of yoga-inspired fashion that embraces your character's curves and radiates confidence. Whether you're embarking on a quest or engaging in fierce battles, feel the empowering energy of Serenity Sirens as you conquer virtual realms with style.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the game's costumes may be hot, but the game does not contain nudity, genitals are not exposed, and it does not contain any sexual scenes.

name: Alien Agent X DLC Yoga Clothes
short_description: Elevate your character's style with this collection of seductive yoga outfits.Embrace the captivating aesthetic of Sensual Silhouettes, making a bold statement in the gaming universe. Upgrade your style, flaunt your character's sensuality, and conquer the virtual realm with irresistible elegance.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Arabic, Korean
*languages with full audio support
